text: Kanika Banerjee (12 October 1924 â€“ 5 April 2000) was an Bengali Rabindra Sangeet singer.Born on 12 October 1924 at Sonamukhi in Bankura district, Kanika joined Visva-Bharati University, Santiniketan in West Bengal, India == References == Category:Indian singers Category:1924 births Category:2000 deaths Category:Bengali musicians
title: Kanika Banerjee
